components.name: Dify Web Interface
components.description: The frontend interface for users to create and manage AI workflows visually.

components.name: Dify Backend API
components.description: Handles requests from the frontend, manages workflows, and integrates with various LLMs and services.

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores user data, workflows, and model configurations.

components.name: Celery Worker
components.description: Asynchronous task queue for handling background tasks such as model inference and data processing.

components.name: Model Providers
components.description: External services providing access to various LLMs for inference and processing.

data_flows.description: User interactions and workflow configurations are sent to the backend for processing.
Workflow data and user configurations are stored in the database.
Requests for model inference are sent to the Celery worker for asynchronous processing.
The worker communicates with external LLM services to perform inference.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates user data and workflows from external services and model providers.

trust_boundaries.name: External Model Provider Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Defines the boundary between Dify and external LLM services, ensuring data privacy.
